_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five benefits a faithful gentleman g: Good persons in the world show compassion first to the faithful
They first approach the faithful, not so much the unfaithful
They first receive alms from the faithful, not so much the unfaithful
They first teach Dhamma to the faithful, not so much the unfaithful
The faithful are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm after death
The qualities of those who associate wit: Fields of merit for the world
